Time Travel: Create a clone of yourself and travel back in time to help your past self with important decisions or to change a pivotal moment in your life.
Personal Research: Use your clones to conduct research on different topics or to conduct experiments on yourself without affecting your original self.
Multitasking: Have your clones perform different tasks simultaneously, allowing you to accomplish more in a shorter amount of time.
Therapy: Use your clones to help you overcome your fears or to work through a difficult situation by experiencing it from a different perspective.
Artistic Expression: Create art or music with your clones, each clone representing a different aspect of your creativity, allowing you to explore new ideas and styles.
